title: Neighbours (the remix) - DAMP (Full potato jacket)
abstract: The Screen Lounge component of The 2004 Show: New Visual Cultures
description: The scene is familiar. A scene you know well. A buffet setting of multinational brands adorns a beautifully set table. Products which for years you have been told you want; you need. The camera pans the table. You recognise everything. So what happens when the desirable turns undesirable? Melbourne art collective DAMP wage war on themselves in a gluttonous, misappropriation of food. A food fight of excessive proportions aims to subvert the subliminal desire global advertising has imposed, via mass media, on mainstream Australia.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1005948; Neighbours (the remix): 2004 New Visual Cultures; Active; 12 Feb 2004-08 Jun 2004
